mapper.select: select lcp.ID from l_community_household_user as chu inner join l_user lu on chu.USER_ID = lu.ID inner join l_community_household lch on chu.HOUSEHOLD_ID = lch.ID inner join l_community_layer lcl on lch.LAYER_ID = lcl.ID inner join l_community_unit lcu on lcl.UNIT_ID = lcu.ID inner join l_community_building lcb on lcu.BUILDING_ID = lcb.ID inner join l_community_period lcp on lcb.PERIOD_ID = lcp.ID where chu.IS_ENABLE = 0 and chu.IS_DELETE = 0 and chu.USER_ID = #{userId}

select lre.PARENT_ID from l_user_role lur left join l_role lr on lur.ROLE_ID = lr.ID left join l_role_resource lrr on lr.ID = lrr.ROLE_ID left join l_resource lre on lrr.RESOURCE_ID = lre.ID where lur.IS_DELETE = 0 and lur.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lr.IS_DELETE = 0 and lr.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lrr.IS_DELETE = 0 and lrr.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lre.IS_DELETE = 0 and lre.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lre.PARENT_ID is not null and lur.USER_ID = #{userId}
